txt.en: 'It's my birthday today, I'm thirty-two. That's half a score older than my little sister.'
'Next year I'll be of age. Then I can finally come into my own.'
'The best gift of all is a fine Golden Perch beer, although a new handkerchief is nice too...oh, or hair ribbons.'
'Fatty Bolger was supposed to be at my party, but he never came.'
